approval.alreadyProcessed: This approval has already been processed.

clockedin.header: {active} of {total} team members currently clocked in:
clockedin.noneActive: None of your {total} team members are currently clocked in.
clockedin.noTeam: You don't have any team members assigned to you.

clockin.alreadyIn: You are already clocked in since {time} ({hours}h {minutes}m).
clockin.cannotNow: Cannot clock in at this time.

clockout.cannotNow: Cannot clock out at this time.
clockout.notClockedIn: You are not currently clocked in.
clockout.pendingApproval: Your clock-out is pending manager approval.

compliance.error: Failed to retrieve compliance data. Please try again later.
compliance.noIssues: No compliance issues found in the last {days} days. Your team is in good standing!

coverage.error: Failed to retrieve coverage data. Please try again later.
coverage.noData: No scheduled coverage data found for {date}.

help.footer: You can also receive approval requests and daily digests directly in {platform}.
help.title: Z8 Bot Commands

openshifts.error: Failed to retrieve open shifts. Please try again later.
openshifts.noShifts: No open shifts found for {period}. All shifts are currently assigned.

pending.footer: View and approve in Z8 or wait for individual approval cards.
pending.header: {count, plural, one {You have {count} pending approval:} other {You have {count} pending approvals:}}
pending.none: You have no pending approval requests. Nice work keeping up!

status.notClockedIn: You are not currently clocked in.

whosout.noneOut: All {total} of your team members are available today.
whosout.noTeam: You don't have any team members assigned to you.

static.errorApprovalNotFound: This approval request no longer exists or has already been processed.
static.errorApprovalResolved: This approval has already been approved or rejected.
static.errorDefault: Something went wrong. Please try again.
static.errorEmployeeNotFound: You don't have an employee record in Z8. Please contact your administrator.
static.errorNotAuthorized: You're not authorized to perform this action.
static.errorTenantNotConfigured: Your organization hasn't completed the Z8 setup yet. Please ask an admin to configure the integration.
static.errorUserNotLinked: Your Teams account isn't linked to Z8. Make sure your Teams email matches your Z8 account.
static.genericError: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again or contact support.
static.linkAlreadyLinked: This Telegram account is already linked to a Z8 account in this organization.
static.linkExpired: This link code has expired. Please generate a new one from your Z8 settings.
static.linkInvalid: Invalid link code. Please check your code and try again.
static.linkSuccess: Your Telegram account has been linked to Z8! Type /help to see available commands.
static.linkUsage: Please provide your link code: /link YOUR_CODE
static.mentionHelp: Hi! I'm the Z8 bot. Type "help" to see available commands.
static.noEmployee: Your account exists but you don't have an employee record in Z8.
static.noOrg: Unable to identify your organization. Please contact support.
static.notLinked: Your Telegram account is not linked to Z8. Go to Settings > Integrations > Telegram in your Z8 dashboard to generate a link code, then send: /link YOUR_CODE
static.notLinkedTeams: I couldn't find your Z8 account. Make sure your Teams email matches your Z8 account email.
static.noUser: Unable to identify your user account.
static.setupBody: Your organization needs to be connected to Z8. Click below to start the setup process.
static.setupNote: Only organization admins can complete this setup.
static.setupRequired: Welcome to Z8! To connect this Microsoft 365 organization to your Z8 account, an admin needs to complete the setup.
static.unconfigured: Your organization's Z8 integration is being set up. Please wait for your admin to complete configuration.
static.welcome: Welcome to Z8! To connect your account, go to Settings > Integrations > Telegram in your Z8 dashboard and generate a link code. Then send: /link YOUR_CODE
static.welcomeTeams: Welcome to Z8! Type "help" to see available commands.
